data.message: Hello Facebook Team. Today i'm going to ask a question. How can i verify my Facebook account or a page can i please have the answer?

replies.message: Hi Ishmaam. If your Page's category is Local Business, Company or Organization, your Page may be eligible for a gray verification badge. Instructions for Page verification can be found here: http://bit.ly/2pgf2qo. Please keep in mind that only some public figures, celebrities and brands have blue verified badges. It's not currently possible to request or purchase a blue verified badge. -Elizabeth
And I'm really interested to work with Facebook how can i?
